General.Name: Advanced Process Systems Corporation
General.Description: Advanced Process Systems Corporation develops and sells semiconductors and display manufacturing equipment primarily in South Korea, China, and Vietnam. It offers excimer laser annealing, laser lift-off, fine metal micro-machining, glass laser scribing in-line, and film laser cutting equipment; rapid thermal processing equipment; one drop filling and encapsulation systems, and temporary bond and de-bond process systems; thin film encapsulation and sputter systems; and dry strip and descum systems. The company was formerly known as Kornic Systems Corporation and changed its name to Advanced Process Systems Corporation in 2009. Advanced Process Systems Corporation was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Hwaseong-si, South Korea.
